entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow or periods of ice pellets overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
